NAME: Inherit the Earth Soundtrack was released
AUTHOR: sev

BODY.p: Some interesting news for you. Wyrmkeep Entertainment Co. has released the ITE Soundtrack on CD. You may listen to a preview and buy it from here. ScummVM supports this game since 0.8.0 and this was mainly possible thanks to our tight collaboration with Wyrmkeep and the fact that they kindly provided us with all source code and the rights to reimplement it. So you may want to support this great company by purchasing the game soundtrack and of course the game itself, and play it with ScummVM.
